title: LG G7 ONE Review - Is PURE Android What We NEED?
tags: lg g7 one vs lg g7
एलजी जी 7 एक बनाम एलजी जी 7
description: The LG G7 Thinq is a good phone but it is now being relaunched as the more affordable LG G7 ONE, part of the Android One lineup.  That means it runs a pure, unmodified version of Android without any wrappers or bloatware.  This may be the best Android phone available right now since it's also supposed to be pretty affordable.      Buy items in this video from Amazon at the links below:  Cooler Master MK750:    Subscribe    Review unit provided free of charge by LG. This video is sponsored by Cooler Master. As per HWC guidelines, no review direction was received from manufacturer.   As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.  Gear list (from Amazon):  Panasonic GH5 -  Panasonic GH4 -  Panasonic G7 -  Canon C100 -  Sony RX100m3 -  Sigma 18-35mm F1.8 -  Cinevate DUZI Slider -  AKG C314 -  AKG C 568 B -  Zoom H5 -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:  Join Our Folding team   Follow us for more updates!
